title: Super Cool ability idea
body:
Hey guys, 

I've got a really cool idea for a skillshot ability that you could maybe implement into a champion in the future!

Ability: Your normal average straight linear skillshot BUT (for example nidalee q) when the projectile is in mid-flight, you can press and hold q to make the ability (the spear in this case) pass through everything that it would normally hit (minions, monsters champs) until you let go of the ability button (q).

What do you think? If you want a red to see PLEASE UPVOTE!
